title: IWeldSymbol.GetArrowHeadInfo
description: Gets an array of doubles that describe the geometry of the arrowhead on the far end of the leader line.
remarks:
This information returned by this method is independent of whether this weld symbol has an arrowhead.
Format of return information is the following array of doubles:
retval
[0] = arrow length (that is, leader into arrowhead)
retval
[1] = arrowhead length
retval
[2] = arrowhead width
retval
[3] = arrowhead style as defined in
swArrowStyle_e
